content: tiny knit ornament - mini pullover - by gogoknit 3 ● needle 1 n1 5 sts right sleeve ● needle 2 n2 9 sts front ● needle 3 n3 5 sts left sleeve ● needle 4 n4 9 sts back join to work in the round being careful not to twist the cast-on edge begin with n1 and work in the round work 5 rounds in 1×1 rib k1 tbl p1 knit 1 round then begin increasing raglan stitches round 1 work increases as follows 8 sts increased body and sleeves ● n1 & n3 rli knit all sts lli ● n2 & n4 k1 raglan st rli knit to 1 st before end lli k1 raglan st round 2 knit all sts repeat rounds 1 2 3 more times you should now have 60 sts in total - 13 sts for each sleeve n1 & n3 - 17 sts each for front and back including raglan sts n2 & n4 then work the following 2 rounds increasing only the body stitches round 1 work increases as follows 4 sts increased body only ● n1 & n3 knit all sts ● n2 & n4 k1 raglan st rli knit to 1 st before end lli k1 raglan st round 2 knit all sts you should now have 64 sts in total - 13 sts for each sleeve n1 & n3 - 19 sts each for front and back including raglan sts n2 & n4 work 1 round to separate the sleeve stitches and join the body in the round as follows ● place 13 sts of the right sleeve n1 on hold using scrap yarn or a stitch holder tiny knit ornament - mini pullover - by gogoknit 4 ● cast on 1 st for the right underarm using the backward loop method ● knit 19 sts n2 ● place 13 sts of the left sleeve n3 on hold ● cast on 1 st for the left underarm using the same method ● knit 19 sts n4 you should now have 40 sts for body continue knitting in the round for 8 rounds using 3 or 4 needles your preference then work 4 rounds in 1×1 rib k1 tbl p1 bind off all stitches making sure the edge is not too tight sleeve transfer 13 sleeve sts from hold to dpns setup round starting at the center of the underarm pick up 1 st from the underarm cast-on this is the bor then pick up 1 st from between the next stitch first held sleeve stitch and the underarm stitch you just picked up knit the 13 held sleeve sts pick up 1 st from between the last sleeve stitch and the underarm stitch at the center 3 sts increased you should now have 16 sts recommended distribution - n1 beginning at bor 6 sts - n2 4 sts - n3 6 sts round 1 work decreases as follows 2 sts decreased ● n1 k1 k2tog knit to end ●
